doc:
Ray Collins (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ray_Collins_(actor) 0 Ray Bidwell Collins (December 10, 1889 – July 11, 1965) was an American character actor in stock and Broadway theatre, radio, films, and television. With 900 stage roles to his credit, he became one of the most successful actors in the developing field of radio drama. A friend and associate of Orson Welles for many years, Collins went to Hollywood with the Mercury Theatre company and made his feature-film debut in Citizen Kane (1941), as Kane's ruthless political rival. Collins appeared in more than 75 films and had one of his best-remembered roles on television, as the irascible Lieutenant Arthur Tragg on the television series Perry Mason. Ray_Bidwell_Collins ( December_10_,_1889 – July_11_,_1965 ) was an_American_character_actor in stock_and_Broadway_theatre , radio , films , and television . With 900_stage_roles to his_credit , he became one of the_most_successful_actors in the_developing_field of radio_drama . A_friend_and_associate of Orson_Welles for many_years , Collins went to Hollywood with the_Mercury_Theatre_company and made his_feature-film_debut in Citizen_Kane_(_1941_) , as Kane 's_ruthless_political_rival . Collins appeared in more_than_75_films and had one of his_best-remembered_roles on television , as the_irascible_Lieutenant_Arthur_Tragg on the_television_series_Perry_Mason .
